_header: Illustre Lodovick of France most christian king
Title(s): Elegy on the death of Bernard Stewart, Lord of Aubigny
Subjects: Stewart, Bernard, lord of Aubigny; elegies
_description: William Dunbar, Elegy on the death of Bernard Stewart, Lord of Aubigny — four 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘For he is gone the flour of chevalrie’

CULLl510.First Lines:
Illuster Lodouick of france most cristin kingThow may complain with
                    sighis lamentable…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…fforȝett we neuir into our orisounTo pray for him
                    þe flour of chavelrie
